title: my Try2
text: 反向传播算法求导的推导过程Definition:$L$ : the No. of layers; $K$ : the No. of neural network’s output; $S_j$ : the No. of j-th layer’s units;($K=S_L$) $a_i^{(j)}$ : the output of j-th layer’s i-th unit; $z_i^{(j)}$ : the input of j-th layer’s i-th unit; $a^{(j)}$ : the output vector of j-th layer, without bias; $z^{(j)}$ : the input vector of j-th layer, without bias; $b^{(j)}$ : the bias of j-th layer; $\Theta^{(j)}$ : the weight matrix from j-th layer to (j+1)-th layer, dim: $S_{j+1}*(S_{j}+1)$; $\Theta_{kn}^{(j)}$ : the weight from j-th layer n-th unit to (j+1)-th layer k-th unit; $g(x)$ : sigmoid function,$$g(x)=\frac{1}{1+e^{-x}}\\$$ $$\begin{align}g’(x) & =(-1)\cdot\frac{1}{(1+e^{-x})^2}\cdot e^{-x}\cdot (-1)\\& =\frac{1}{(1+e^{-x})^2}\cdot e^{-x}\\& =\frac{1}{1+e^{-x}}\cdot (1-\frac{1}{1+e^{-x}})\\& = g(x)\cdot (1-g(x))\end{align}$$ Neural Network Model:$$\begin{cases} z^{(j+1)}=\Theta^{(j)}* \begin{bmatrix} b^{(j)} \\ a^{(j)} \end{bmatrix}\\ a^{(j+1)}=g(z^{(j+1)})\end{cases}$$ Cost Function:$$J(\Theta)=\frac{1}{2}\sum_{k\in K}(a_k^{(L)}-y_k)^2$$ Diff of Output Layer’s Weight :$$\begin{align}\frac{\partial }{\partial\Theta_{kn}^{(L)}} J(\Theta) & =\frac{\partial}{\partial\Theta_{kn}^{(L)}} (\frac{1}{2}\sum_{k\in K}(a_k^{(L)}-y_k)^2)\\& =\frac{1}{2}\cdot2\cdot(a_k^{(L)}-y_k)\cdot \frac{\partial a_k^{(L)}}{\partial\Theta_{kn}^{(L)}}\\& =(a_k^{(L)}-y_k)\cdot \frac{\partial g(z_k^{(L)})}{\partial \Theta_{kn}^{(L)}}\\& =(a_k^{(L)}-y_k)\cdot \frac{\partial g(z_k^{(L)})}{\partial z_k^{(L)}}\cdot \frac{\partial z_k^{(L)}}{\partial \Theta_{kn}^{(L)}}\end{align}$$ the second item of left equation:$$\begin{align}\frac{\partial g(z_k^{(L)})}{\partial z_k^{(L)}}& =g(z_k^{(L)})\cdot (1-g(z_k^{(L)})) \\& =a_k^{(L)}\cdot(1-a_k^{(L)})\end{align}$$the third item of left equation:$$\begin{align}\frac{\partial z_k^{(L)}}{\partial \Theta_{kn}^{(L)}} & =a_n^{(L-1)}\end{align}$$total:$$\begin{align}\frac{\partial }{\partial\Theta_{kn}^{(L)}} J(\Theta) & =(a_k^{(L)}-y_k)\cdot a_k^{(L)}\cdot(1-a_k^{(L)})\cdot a_n^{(L-1)}\\& = \delta^{(L)} \cdot a_n^{(L-1)}\end{align}$$define: $\delta^{(L)}=(a_k^{(L)}-y_k)\cdot a_k^{(L)}\cdot(1-a_k^{(L)})$ Diff of Hidden Layer’s Weight :$$\begin{align}\frac{\partial }{\partial\Theta_{kn}^{(j)}} J(\Theta) & =\frac{\partial}{\partial\Theta_{kn}^{(j)}} (\frac{1}{2}\sum_{k\in K}(a_k^{(L)}-y_k)^2)\\& =\frac{1}{2}\cdot2\cdot\sum_{k\in K}(a_k^{(L)}-y_k)\cdot \frac{\partial a_k^{(L)}}{\partial\Theta_{kn}^{(j)}}\\& =\sum_{k\in K}(a_k^{(L)}-y_k)\cdot \frac{\partial g(z_k^{(L)})}{\partial \Theta_{kn}^{(j)}}\\& =\sum_{k\in K}(a_k^{(L)}-y_k)\cdot \frac{\partial g(z_k^{(L)})}{\partial z_k^{(L)}}\cdot \frac{\partial z_k^{(L)}}{\partial \Theta_{kn}^{(j)}}\end{align}$$ the third item of left equation:$$\begin{align}\frac{\partial z_k^{(L)}}{\partial \Theta_{kn}^{(j)}} & =\frac{\partial z_k^{(L)}}{\partial a_k^{(j)}}\cdot \frac{\partial a_k^{(j)}}{\partial \Theta_{kn}^{(j)}}\\& =\sum_{k\in K}(a_k^{(L)}-y_k)\cdot \frac{\partial g(z_k^{(L)})}{\partial \Theta_{kn}^{(j)}}\\& =(a_k^{(L)}-y_k)\cdot \frac{\partial g(z_k^{(L)})}{\partial z_k^{(L)}}\cdot \frac{\partial z_k^{(L)}}{\partial \Theta_{kn}^{(L)}}\end{align}$$

title: 你是什么啊？
text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
